title: Bhalobasa Aaj Kal
overview: Dana (Mahiya Mahi) is the daughter of a wealthy man Aliraj, They lived in abroad for many years, That is why Dana wanted to visit Bangladesh but his father did not agree to send her there. So one day she left the home without telling her father and leave for Bangladesh. When she reached Bangladesh, she met with Rana (Shakib Khan) who was a local fraud. He tried to dupe Dana. But interestingly they fell madly in love instead.
